title: Case Details - Form
respondentSelfAssignmentInfo: You can use this self assignment page to get access to the details of the digital case and it's contents.

id.required: Enter an online case reference number that exactly matches the case details
id.invalid: You entered an invalid submission reference. Submission reference should be 16 numeric characters in 123456789123456 or 1234-5678-9123-4567 formats

respondentName.required: Enter respondent name that exactly matches the case details

firstName.required: Enter claimant name that exactly matches the case details

lastName.required: Enter claimant last name that exactly matches the case details

hiddenErrorField.api: Unable to find the case. Data you entered does not match with any case
